__TOC__


TouchTables, also called TTs, are produced by TouchLay. They can interact with fingers, symbols and also objects.

{{http://www.touchlay.com/lightbox/data/thumbnails1/1.jpg}} A TouchTable booting into Ubuntu

{{http://www.touchlay.com/lightbox/data/thumbnails1/5.jpg}} A TouchTable being touched

{{http://www.touchlay.com/lightbox/data/thumbnails1/8.jpg}} The 2nd prototype of the TT

More information at: http://www.touchlay.com/project-touchtable
